page.title: 02WIS. GREEN HORTICULT. SOC
page.content: The local horticultural society has about one hundred members and every August bank holiday there is a Flower Show on the green.There are sideshows with little stalls like "How many sweets in the jar?","Hoopla","Treasure Hunt" and "Tombola".There are also swingboats that go backwards and forwards and people selling hotdogs.The money raised goes towards helping old people in the village.In a big tent there are fruit and vegetable displays,flower arranging,bees and their honey and a pot plant stall.Children's work and drawings are also on display.In a corner of the tent a man makes and sells pottery whilst other people sell their paintings.
